member.name: T:OracleHelper.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:OracleHelper.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:OracleHelper.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:OracleHelper.OracleHelper.getCreateTableString(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Builds a create script for a table in the database based on the schema of the datatable passed in.
member.param: The datatable that is usedto build the create String. Only schema is used, data is ignored.
